overview:
Neil invests time as an active advisor and board member to digital media, entertainment and mobile technology companies. Most recently he was SVP Corporate and Business Development at SayNow, which sold to Google.

Previously, Neil was COO at Akimbo where he transitioned the set-top box company to a SaaS based content distribution platform.

In 2004, Neil co-founded On Demand Media Group, which provides strategic management advice and implementation for the digital media, entertainment, gaming and telecommunications industries. Clients include cable, mobile and satellite operators, set-top box manufacturers, studios, and wireless platforms throughout the world. Neil began his career as Director of worldwide acquisitions at Warner Bros.
